video.title: World War II: The Last Heroes
video.synopsis: This series chronicles the final years of the Allied campaign in World War II and reveals what it was really like in the trenches on Omaha Beach.

episodes.synopsis: On June 6, 1944, Allied soldiers from Britain, the U.S. and Canada land on five Normandy beaches: Gold, Sword, Utah, Omaha and Juno.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Allied soldiers push on to take their first objective, the city of Caen, where they're met by Panzer forces determined to push them back into the sea.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Hitler orders a massive counterattack in an attempt to cut the Allies in two, but British, Canadian and American forces surround the German army.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Seizing the Scheldt Estuary fell to the Canadians, who fought a bloody battle through mud, minefields and canals to secure a critical shipping route.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: U.S. infantry divisions find themselves fighting off the best of the German army in the inaccessible hill and forest country of the Ardennes.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: With only the Rhine River between the Allies and Hitler, each of the Allied armies undertakes to cross the river in its own way.
episodes.title: Episode 6
